description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition(s) 2 (Approved plans) of Planning Permission 15/16883/FUL (Demolition of former health centre; change of use and extension to No.3 Oakhill and erection of 2 no. four-storey residential blocks including accommodation in roof space (41 no. residential flats in total comprising 16 x one bedroom, 17 x two-bedroom and 8 x three bedroom units) to allow for the following changes; erection of balustrade to top of existing front bay
